lender.name: Sophie
lender.loan_because: Instead of baby presents, my parents set up a Kiva account for me so that friends and family can contribute. This way, I can help others through micro financing. Any interest I make on my loans will go towards my college fund!

lender.name: 6smarketing
lender.loan_because: Delivering success through innovative Internet marketing.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because:
It makes me feel good.
As a hurricane survivor myself, I definitely know what it feels like to be on the short stick of a disaster and have to pull yourself up and out without assistance. Things are just now starting to turn around for me, and honestly, I would have loved for someone to have been there to help me out ... and I've always been a caregiver, not a taker.
So, I guess the best way to put it, at this point in my life: I'm finally in a position to give back a little ... I'm still sleeping on the floor after a year plus (and expect to do so for at least another six months due to work on my house) ... and I'm still in court with my insurance company over the hurricane ... but at least now I'm not living hand to mouth.
I need all the good karma I can get, and damnit, there's a lot of folk out there, that are a LOT worse off than I am now.
So I'm going to try this out.
lender.occupational_info: I run one of the ten major communications centers in my home state.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think of all of the frivolous things that I do with my money every day, and for such a small amount I can have a direct impact on someone's future. It just feels right.
lender.occupational_info: I play professional pool with the Women's Professional Billiard Association.

lender.name: Tuomas
lender.loan_because: it is surely amazing way to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: Intrested about agricultural stuff.

lender.loan_because: of my entrepreneurial spirit toward individuals seeking a better life.

lender.name: Andres & Sara
lender.loan_because:
Our wedding guests were so generous when we asked them for Kiva Certificates as presents. After an amazing start of over 70 loans we'll be re-lending each loan repayment to help even more people.
Between us all we're going to make the world a better place!
Big thanks to Al, Dave K, Flipper, Jonathan, Mark, Nathan, Adriaan & Jeanine, Becki & Chris, Cat & Rich, Clare & Sean, Dan & Jeanine, Dave & Anelia, Dawn & Toon, Gilly & Don, Mick & Ruth, Nat & Katy, Jules & Ali H, Mads & Iain, Myra & Shirl, Sarah & Paul and Wai & Yin.
(if we've missed your name we may have missed your gift -please let us know!)

I like seeing people succeed in what they do.
I like the idea of a private way to help the world's poor entrepreneurs with a small but efficient use of money.
lender.occupational_info: I try to learn about the world and the universe as much as I can, and leave my own little mark in them.

lender.name: Mahendra
lender.loan_because: i am 22 years old and i have no parents .there is nobody to sponsor me for my study and my main aim is to study hard and research on lots of things and be a great biotechnologist in the future and save the whole world from different fileds.
lender.occupational_info: kiva is so amazing i am still a new user to kiva but i guess this will be my first step to change my life to a second level.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: a little bit of my money goes a long way
lender.occupational_info: i produce and edit documentaries about social issues in the U.S.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I'd love to help the poor directly. It helps me see how they benefit quicker instead of going to an impersonal bank or greedy money lender. My passion is to help kids and teenagers learn a vocational trade so that they can be set for life. I believe that no kid around the world should suffer for any reason. Kids are supposed to enjoy their childhood and have a full life, have fond memories of their childhood, not of pain, lack, and hunger. That is the worst memory anyone can have growing up. Helping poor parents will ensure each of their kids will have a happy life. Even if I can help change one family's future, that will be my reward.
lender.occupational_info: I help buy and sell homes, design print advertisements for local companies. I also write news and business articles.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to provide for their families and energize their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I help people grow in their relationship with Christ.

lender.name: Wendell
lender.loan_because: I run several small businesses and organizations in Hawaii, I know how tough it is when you don't have money to do what you want to do, chase your dreams. Instead of spending my money on things I really don't need, I wanted to give other people an opportunity to chase their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping people pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because:
I loan because I know how hard it is sometimes to obtain financing when you are starting a new business venture. Unlike Canada, there are many places around the world where people have virtually no access to credit, and even a small loan can make a big difference. Entrepreneurs are very important part of every society, and lack of capital and fresh credit in developing countries can hamper their ability to build a successful business.
In Canada where I live and work, its relatively easy to get loans for various purposes, and if you have a great idea and a solid business plan it shouldnt be a problem to get a business loan. If I can offer similar financing conditions to even 1 person in a country where its hard to access credit, Ill be more than happy.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe that family and community-based farms and businesses are what keep local economy alive.
lender.occupational_info: I provide materials used in theatres and other performance locations. I also create planet-friendly gifts that are sold online.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It's so easy to make a big difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: people helped me when I was starting out and I'll always appreciate it. It's nice to be in a position to do the same for others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I help people realize their dreams by helping them buy their first home, or by helping them invest their hard earned money in solid real estate investments.

lender.name: Nguyen Hung
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Naoki
lender.loan_because: It's an intelligent way of spending money helping people out.

lender.name: Lukas
lender.loan_because: We have different gifts, according to the grace given us... if it is contributing to the needs of others, let him give generously... Romans 12:6-8

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: Because I care and have been blessed. But there is no greater blessing than to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mystery Shopper.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: "The poor have shown the church the true way to go. A church that does not speak out from the side of the poor is not the true church of Jesus." - ++Oscar Romero
lender.occupational_info: I help produce audio bibles recorded in languages around the world.

lender.loan_because: I want to give back and help other

lender.occupational_info: I make bank. Literally. I'm an architect. Of banks.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: God has seen fit to bless me with a successful career and few bills. I can do nothing else than share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: I help make Bible apps for phones and mobile devices to make reading and studying the Word easier.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I think it's the best way to help people and I do it also in memory of my mother Silvana and my father-in-law Renato (I think they would have appreciate this)

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I sell clothing like suits, casual wear (t-shirts, jeans, shoes) to men who are looking to update their wardrobe.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I find it a privilege to be stable enough in my own life to help others
